name: Billy Banana Swims the World
description:
One day, Billy Banana decided to swim, and swim, and swim.

Model is from Kirby's Air Ride: https://www.models-resource.com/custom_edited/kirbycustoms/model/52630/

Alphabet letter sounds from here: https://freesound.org/people/dersuperanton/sounds/434731/

Ocean sounds from the Soniss library: https://sonniss.com/gameaudiogdc

Going through the images is an idea stolen from Lilith Zone's wonderful Map (go play it!!): https://lilithzone.itch.io/town-1
